name: Age of Empires II HD: The African Kingdoms
summary: The African Kingdoms, second expansion pack of Age of Empires II HD was announced on April 9, 2015, and released on November 5, 2015. The African Kingdoms introduces four new civilizations: the Berbers, Ethiopians, Malians, and the Portuguese. It includes new maps, campaigns (Sundjata, Francisco de Almeida, Yodit, and Tariq ibn Ziyad), and units, a new game mode, and numerous balance and gameplay adjustments.
info:
• 开发: SkyBox Labs , Forgotten Empires
  • 发行: Xbox Game Studios

  • 别名: Age of Empires II (2013): The African Kingdoms
  • 游戏类型: RTS
  • 游玩人数: 单人、多人
  • 发行日期: 2015 年 11 月 6 日
